description: JOSHUA M. GREENE  has produced  films for PBS and Disney, has served as vice president for New York’s largest PR   rm, and was appointed director of strategic planning for the United Nations Peace Summit of Religious and Spiritual Leaders. He was also an adjunct professor at Hofstra University in New York.
name: Joshua M. Greene
